pages.text: (Allah taâ€™ala ne) farmaya aye iblees, tujhe kya hoa ke tu sajda karne walo mein shamil na hoa
wo bola ke main aisa nahi ke is insaan ko sajda karo jise tu ne kaali aur sadi hoyi khan-khanaati mitthi se paida kiya hai
farmaya ab tu bahisht se nikal ja kyo ke tu raanda darga3 hai
aur tujh par meri phitkaar hai qayaamat ke din tak
kehne laga ke aye mere rub mujhe us din tak ki dheel de ke log dubaara utha khade kiye jaaye
farmaya ke accha tu un mein se hai jinhe muhullath mili hai
roze muqarrar tak ke waqt ki
(shaitaan ne) kaha ke aye mere rab! chu ke tu ne mujhe gumrah kiya hai mujhe bhi qasam hai ke main bhi zameen mein un ke liye mu-aasi4 ko muzayyan5 karonga aur un sab ko behkaaonga bhi
sivaae tere un bandho ke jo muntaqab kar liye gaye hai
irshaad hoa ke haan yahi mujh tak pahonchne ki sidhi raah hai
mere bandho par tujhe koi ghalba nahi lekin haan jo gumraah log teri pairvi kare
yaqinan un sub ke waade ki jageh jahannam hai
jis ke saath darwaaze hai, har darwaaze ke liye un ka ek hissa bata hoa hai
parhezgaar jannati log baagho aur chashmo mein honge
(un se kaha jayega) salaamti aur aman ke saath is mein dakhil ho jao
un ke dilo mein jo kuch ranjish wa kina tha hum sub kuch nikaal denge, wo bhai bhai bane hoye ek dosre ke aamne saamne taqto par baithe honge
na to waha unhe koi takleef cho sakti hai aur na wo wahaa se kabhi nkaale jayenge
mere bandho ko qabar de do ke main bahuth hee baqshne wala aur bada hee meherbaan hoon
aur saath hee mere azaab bhi nihaayath dardnaak hai
unhe ibraheem ke mehmaano ka (bhi) haal suna do
